note.p: Education: Corpus Christi College, Cambridge (matriculated 1712); Inner Temple (1712)
Career: Called to the Bar (1718); King's Counsel (1730); Chief Justice of Carmarthen, Cardigan and Pembrokeshire (1724-1753); Treasurer of the Inner Temple (1738); MP for New Woodstock (1746-1753)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; GEC; Venn; Sedgwick
References: Obituaries in 'Gentleman's Magazine' 1764, p450; 'London Magazine' 1764, p541
Notes: BR gives death date as December 1764.
